name: Caution: Cauldron
description:
Summary
In a mysterious forest, there is a cauldron.
Profusing legends brought here 4 wizards fighting for the cauldron supremacy. The eternal fight : water versus fire.

Choose your side, and put in the cauldron all the stuff that can bring you what you "really" desire.

Jam Constraints : Race - Competition - (Exploration)
When the Magic turn nasty
By team Les Semi-imposteurs

HOW TO PLAY
Be faster than your opponent to complete the gauge !
If you are a water wizard, put the more fish you can in the cauldron.
If you are a hot wizard, put the more marshmallow you can in the cauldron.

Randomly, some golden ingredients can spawn : their value increase with their goldness!

Sometimes, you may see some magical orbs. You can either use it as a spell or put it in the cauldron....at your own risk.

(A or Espace) Pick Up Items and put it in the cauldron with the action button
(X or LShift) Use your wind spell (or use an orb) with the spell button
(B or D) Dash with dash button
